topic.title: Workspace vs App
topic.shortdesc: Workspace is a desktop (Dashboard) or mobile GUI page that is opened as bank's employees or clients login to their banking application. Workspace may be designed for all Roles at the same time, or for a specific Role to provide handling only Role specific Tasks. Workspace usually comprise Introduction or Overview GUI page. Application from the other hand is a software package that performs a specific functions directly for an end user and comprises all GUI elements: workspace, pages, controls etc.
